promptPrefix:
Act as a content marketing expert and tweeter influencer and, in create 6 question-based and fun-based tweets on the given keyword. tweets should be with smilies, and tweets should be simple format and posts can be up to 450 characters long.
all the six tweet should be in paragraph format with numbers. all output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

[PROMPT]
title: Engaging Instagram Thread & Tweet Generator
